1222490.name: SCP : Facility Manager
1222490.description:
The SCP Foundation requires your services… and I'm afraid you can not decline.

You're now in charge of one of the Foundation's many Sites. Your predecessor seems to have reached his expiry sooner than it was scheduled, leaving you alone with the task of managing the facility beset by chaos.

Draw up plans and build quarters and containment cells to contain as much entities as possible. Lead research on your residents, manage their needs and requirements.

And most importantly, don't forget to stock up on more D-Class personnel… they will be useful, you'll see.
Every technological discovery will keep you from an 'early retirement' or a containment breach.

Times are hard and you will have to lead by example, or at least avoid releasing the contents of your small personal prison.

Secure, Contain, Protect.


This game offers an experience inspired by: 'Rimworld' and 'Prison Architect'.

  • Build an entire Site of the foundation from scratch!
  • Contain SCP.
  • Fight against GOI!
  • Send a MTF to capture new SCP and find new ways to contain them.
  • Do research to improve your guard and scientist.
  • Build walls and doors, make plans et prepare your defenses!
  • Take care of your site and build new containment chambers.
  • And be the best Site-Director ever!
